sqlquery.name: SQL_SM_RoleOrgList.query
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ pid,rolename,orgname,orgtype,roledns,rolepid /*COUNT*/ from ( select m.pid pid,l.rolename rolename,r.fullname orgname,m.orgtype orgtype,l.roledns roledns,l.pid rolepid from bs_t_sm_role l,bs_t_sm_roleorg m,bs_t_sm_user r where l.pid=m.roleid and m.orgid=r.pid and m.orgtype=1 and r.status='1' union select m.pid pid,l.rolename rolename,r.depfullname orgname,m.orgtype orgtype,l.roledns roledns,l.pid rolepid from bs_t_sm_role l,bs_t_sm_roleorg m,bs_t_sm_dep r where l.pid=m.roleid and m.orgid=r.pid and m.orgtype=2 and r.status='1' ) where 1=1 $customwhere$ $privilege$

sqlquery.name: SQL_SM_RoleOrgList.theRole_query
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ pid,rolename,orgname,orgtype,roledns /*COUNT*/ from ( select m.pid pid,l.rolename rolename,r.fullname orgname,m.orgtype orgtype,l.roledns roledns from bs_t_sm_role l,bs_t_sm_roleorg m,bs_t_sm_user r where l.pid=m.roleid and m.orgid=r.pid and m.orgtype=1 $theRoleId$ union select m.pid pid,l.rolename rolename,r.depfullname orgname,m.orgtype orgtype,l.roledns roledns from bs_t_sm_role l,bs_t_sm_roleorg m,bs_t_sm_dep r where l.pid=m.roleid and m.orgid=r.pid and m.orgtype=2 $theRoleId$ ) where 1=1 $customwhere$
